name.min: Service name cannot be bellow 5 letters
name.max: Service name cannot be more than 90 letters
name.pattern: Service name contains invalid characters. Please use letters, numbers, a period(.) or coma(,)
name.unique: Service name has already been registered

attendant.required: An attendant must be signed in during service registration

price.min: Service price cannot be below 100 ksh
price.max: Service price cannot be more than 50000 ksh
price.pattern: Service price contains invalid characters. Please use numbers

description.min: Service description cannot be bellow 10 letters
description.max: Service description cannot be more than 300 letters
description.pattern: Service description contains invalid characters. Please use letters, numbers, a period(.) or coma(,)
